Interface Draw

All Known Implementing Classes:
Circle, Rectangle
public interface Draw

All figures supported by drawing program must implement this interface.

Method Summary
abstract  boolean contains(double x, double y)
          If the coordinate (x,y) lies inside or on the object, return true, false otherwise.
abstract  void draw(Graphics g)
          The object should draw itself using the supplied graphics instance
abstract  Color getColor()
           
abstract  double getHeight()
           
abstract  double getWidth()
           
abstract  double getX()
           
abstract  double getY()
           
abstract  void globalDraw(Graphics g, int globalX, int globalY)
           
abstract  void move(double dx, double dy)
          move the object dx pixels to the right.
abstract  void setColor(Color color)
           
abstract  void setEnd(double x, double y)
          The object's ending (x,y) coordinates are changed.
abstract  void setStart(double x, double y)
          The object's (x,y) starting coordintes are changed to the new values (x, y)
 

Method Detail

contains

boolean contains(double x,
                 double y)
If the coordinate (x,y) lies inside or on the object, return true, false otherwise.

Parameters:
x - coordinate
Returns:
true if (x,y) is inside or on the object.

move

void move(double dx,
          double dy)
move the object dx pixels to the right. If dx is negative move the object to the left. Move the object down dy pixels, or up if dy is negative.

Parameters:
dx - pixel units
dy - pixel units

setColor

void setColor(Color color)

setEnd

void setEnd(double x,
            double y)
The object's ending (x,y) coordinates are changed. The meaning of ending (x,y) depends on the particular object.

Parameters:
new - value for x
new - value for y

setStart

void setStart(double x,
              double y)
The object's (x,y) starting coordintes are changed to the new values (x, y)

Parameters:
new - value for x
new - value for y
